comment_data.body:
Just a guess, maybe your config or a plugin is also enabling the old `lua/lspconfig/*` config. This is discussed in the readme.

You gave no info about your Nvim version, your config, or your plugins, so I'm going to autoclose this.

@justinmk Thank you for your hint. 

You are correct the problem is caused by my configuration

```lua
        config = function(_, opts)
            -- local lspconfig = require('lspconfig')
            for server, config in pairs(opts.servers) do
                config.capabilities = require('blink.cmp').get_lsp_capabilities(config.capabilities)
                -- lspconfig[server].setup(config)   -- My original config that has the problem   
                vim.lsp.enable(server, config)         -- After changing into this the issue get resolved
            end
        ...
        end
```

title: "clangd" clients triggered multiple times and show duplicate entries when do souce code navigation
